about_the_game:
This is a dark fairy tale style, fantasy adventure game, you can control the character to explore the treasure in this fantasy world.

A non-traditional point-and-click adventure game that requires players to play in a world full of fantasy,

Accept the guidance of the squirrel fortune teller and untie the four vines blocking the way in the paradise
Explore to collect various items and solve interesting interrelated problems
finally get the treasure

During the process, you will meet all kinds of small animals, gain teammates, and trigger various adventure plots: the secret passage leading to the mouse city, the mysterious rainforest cave, the weird theater on the high platform, the intricate underground labyrinth...


The overall art style of light picture book is adopted, and there is no graphic narrative without lengthy dialogue
1 large map for characters and teammates to walk
21 fully animated, multi-prop interactive cg
23 interactive characters
42 main scenes

The store page is not the final version, and the game video, screenshots and other content are not the final effect of the game. We are still stepping up the decoration, so stay tuned for more content!

content_descriptors.notes: There may be violence and nudity in the game that are not suitable for everyone, please purchase with caution

name: Lost3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
